vote.text: Amendment SA 4300 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4300 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6120-6121) Relating to multi-spectral imaging capabilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4300 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4300 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
